Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield International Venues Ltd. Offers 2 Olympic size skating rinks. Aims to develop ice sports for learners through to professionals in figure and dance skating, ice hockey, junior ice hockey and speed skating and Curling for all ages. Has an ice academy offering junior and adult sessions, learn to skate courses, parties and events. Ice stewards available. Also holds dry boarded events in a 1500 seater facility such as boxing and judo. Also has the Aerial Extreme Course featuring more than 30 challenging obstacles including rope bridges, scramble nets, zip wires, swinging logs and balance beams. A registered charity.

ContactName.entry: Simon Coates, Operations Manager/Mandy Janes, General Manager/David Bly, Events Co-ordinator

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 9am-7pm, Sat & Sun various times (office times), Mon 4.15-5.30pm, Tues 10am-12noon, Wed 4.15-5.30pm, 7.30-10pm, Thurs 10am-12noon, 2-4pm, 7.30-10pm, Fri 2-4pm, 4.15-5.30pm, 7.30-10pm, Sat 10.30am-12.30pm, 1-4pm, 7.30-10pm (public sessions), Sun 10.30am-12.30pm, 104pm (public sessions), please check times as they are subject to change
